column4: I am looking for a wifi laser printer, and I want to select it with Ubuntu in mind. Any brand or product suggestions?
-   ... a good (verry good ) laser printer,  would be  the  samsung clp310 (BUT) its got non-GPL (But free (as in beer) drivers for ubuntu )
Sorry, I'm trying to pm you and not having much luck it seems. Anyway, what do I lose by the Samsung's drivers being non-GPL?
